link.title: North Douglas School District | No. 22 | Drain, Ore. schools

meta.name: description
meta.content: North Douglas School District No. 22 serves 300+ students in Drain, Oregon. We pride ourselves on top academic performance and collaboration with our community.
North Douglas School District | No. 22 | Drain, Ore. schools
North Douglas School District No. 22 serves 300+ students in Drain, Oregon. We pride ourselves on top academic performance and collaboration with our community.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Drain, No. 22, North Douglas, Oregon, School District, Warriors

div.data-state: defaultPanelState desktopView alignLeft unselected flexibleWidthFixed noTransition normal link

div.p: Our district has the honor of operating out of the Drain Castle, which was the city founder's home.

div.data-state: defaultPanelState desktopView alignLeft unselected flexibleWidthFixed noTransition normal noLink

div.p: Home of the Warriors, North Douglas High School has about 80 students in grades 9 through 12.

div.data-state: defaultPanelState desktopView alignLeft unselected flexibleWidthFixed noTransition normal noLink

span.span: Welcome to the North Douglas School District!Â

Our schools serve more than 300 students who live in Drain, Oregon. We PRIDE ourselves on top academic performance and collaboration with our community, which offers our district and students much-appreciated support.

div.p: Current job openings within the district
Today, tomorrow, next month, next year! #WeWillPlayAgain
High School Parents and Students Update 4-8-2020
Please click here to view our Division 22 Assurances documentation.
